model_description: this config file is just for testing the checks on previous runs

userid.description: Always required, to be included in all config files.

runid.description: Always required, to be included in all config files.

basinid.description: Include whenever not using preset basin, i.e. West Brook.

rscript.description: Name of the script that this config file is for. Always required, to be included in all config files.

pre_run.description: Can be a single run or multiple runs (i.e. fish model needs both stream flow and temp inputs).

preset_basin.description: Can be west brook or null.  Eventually, add a few more preset options?
